hero.desc: Dr. Syed Md. Muhsin provides specialized care in General, Laparoscopic, and Hepatobiliary surgery. Treating complex conditions of the gallbladder, liver, and pancreas with precision.

about.name: Dr. Syed Md. Muhsin
about.bio1: Dr. Syed Md. Muhsin is a highly skilled General, Laparoscopic, and Hepatobiliary surgeon in Chattogram.
about.bio2: He specializes in gallbladder diseases, liver tumors, bile duct disorders, pancreatic diseases, and routine procedures like hernia repair and appendectomies.

services.title: Specialized Treatments
services.desc: Comprehensive surgical solutions for gastrointestinal and hepatobiliary conditions.

gallbladder: Treatment for gallstones and inflammation using advanced laparoscopic techniques.
liver: Surgical management of complex liver conditions including tumors and cysts.
bile: Expert surgical care for obstructions, stones, and strictures in the bile ducts.
pancreas: Specialized interventions for pancreatitis and pancreatic masses.
hernia: Advanced repair for inguinal, umbilical, and incisional hernias.
appendix: Urgent surgical removal of the appendix to prevent rupture and complications.

features.title: Why Choose Dr. Muhsin?
features.desc: Modern surgical care with advanced techniques and patient‑centric approach.

advanced: Specialized in Hepatobiliary surgery for complex liver and bile duct disorders.
minimally: Laparoscopic techniques ensuring smaller incisions, less pain, and quicker recovery.
patient: Providing compassionate consultations at Surgiscope Hospital, Chattogram.
